What is our competitive edge?

We assist with your Data, Analytics, Machine Learning, and AI needs, including the development of models of your business operations. But then we go further – we close a learnable loop around your models by measuring your system’s output (instrumentation), sending the output through our algorithms, and finally prescribing some actions (actuation) to align with your objectives. The end result – an ongoing more optimized plan of action for your business operations…

Services

Data Preparation

Data cleaning, imputation, using tools like Pandas.

Machine Learning

Regression, Classification using FFNN, CNN, RNN. Also, more traditional methods like decision trees, random forests.

Modeling

Genetic programming for the harder cases.

Â 

Optimization

Static optimization for one-time solutions.

Dynamic Optimization

Optimization for time-series data. Approximate DP / Reinforcement Learning.

Deployment

Deployment to production for final use in a business setting.
